title: What were your favorite urf champions?
body:
For me it was {{champion:29}} 
spamming 3 expunges when the enemy had 6 stacks on them always got them by suprise. having almost perma stealth to give those eve players a taste of their medicine was fun too. And just randomly spamming ult to stand out of range and destroy towers (15s cd) was even cooler. Not to  mention getting max attack speed just from {{item:3153}}  and Ambush (Q).
OR playing him ap with {{item:3115}}  {{item:3124}} .

Who was ur favoraite champion in urf and why? (btw  if u spammed tryhard  champs like {{champion:62}}  {{champion:28}}  {{champion:35}} then keep it to yourself)

replies.body: For me I had the most fun with  {{champion:98}} going {{item:3931}} and {{item:3091}} then tank.
i can imagine the perma % hp damage mr shredding monster the enemy team had to face :p

Swain is fucking hilarious. I love Jayce and Morgana by far.

Malphite is pretty obnoxious too post 6.
perma swain ult! op op
{{champion:30}} I AM THE LIGHTBRINGEEEEER
{{champion:114}}

teemo{{champion:17}} 
all the mushrooms, got random kills while farming, aqaaqaaqaaqaqaqa people to death :)
ahaaa i remember walking into one of teemo's minefields near dragon and getting rekt
Teemo and Garen.
how did garen work? :D

> [{quoted}](name=The Best Twitch,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=n0if7652,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2016-04-25T15:55:31.313+0000)
>
> how did garen work? :D

http://www.replay.gg/search/na/quepha#2169479537

cancel judgement ASAP and it refunds the full cooldown so you can cast it again instantly, I think the way damage ticks work cause it to deal an ending tick and starting tick very close to each other because it felt like I got some burst every time I reactivated.

built youmuu's so between it and Q I was able to always have a fat ms buff.

First blood
powerfarmed to always have a level lead
28/11/1 when our team earned 48 kills, so I had most of the kills, most of the kill participation, and only one time was anyone able to ks over me.
finished the game with a pentakill and tp'ing into the enemy base to finish off the nexus.
:o dam thats prety cool

{{champion:30}}  was fun... nobody built MR so once I hit level 6 it was funny...

But Eve was fun too, she could kite multiple camps all at once.
I just built a zhonya, and every time he ulted i used it :P
No MR? Almost everyone I've seen either got Maw or Abyssal at some point. Sure, it's not much, but it certainly helps early on.

When Karth gets to ult every 20 seconds, you need a lot of MR.
Every time you buy purchase some MR. I buy some MP, I actually buy a lot of MP.
{{item:3020}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3136}} {{item:3001}} 

Oh and if my team buys {{item:3091}} it turns laughable...

{{champion:8}} 
I would max my pool first and the cd was 2.8s for 2s of invulnerability. I rushed {{item:3157}}
especially with the 15s zhonya cd :D

{{champion:55}} {{champion:134}} 
Does this make me a try hard asshole? I hope not because spinning on a less than a second cd and while just mindlessly spamming spheres even when no one was around was really fun.
nah sounds like fun :D
{{champion:111}}  tanky ap
{{champion:35}} I finally saw how pink ward plays
None. I played 2 games of URF as Kindred and it was utter crap. Won both

{{champion:126}} >> I just love this guy. Lv2 onwards, he even outpoked stuff like {{champion:99}}, {{champion:25}}  and {{champion:268}} , which otherwise were a nightmare to deal with. Just build all 3 {{item:3134}} Items, add a {{item:3812}} afterwards and you melt faces.

{{champion:60}} >> My sleeper op for URF. Instead of maxing Q>W>E, you now max W>E>Q and build full AP. Volatile Spider is not just great for AoE clears, the opponent has to run away from it unless they want to get chunked out from it. In Spider Form, Frenzy gives you so much AS that you melt towers at a speed, where even Azir looks jealously at. Cocoon has a 2 second stund on a ~2.8 second Cooldown at level5, that's why I max that second. Q is really not that big in URF imo, as it deals % dmg and almost no one builds builds tank, so you barely do high numbers with it before super late game. 

{{champion:43}} >> If you haven't figured it out yet, I love long range poke champs xD Karma is just the next in line with Mantra available pretty much every other second. Your Q shits on everything, your shield is up almost 24/7 which also gives you/your team bonus MS and you have a chain, which you only use because it's there lol. With all her tools, I see her being somewhat immortal, unless you get greedy. All you have to do is RQ and E in tandem and you're good to go ^^

{{champion:22}} >> Honorable mention. mlg420noscope ults every 20 seconds, you will hit something sometime if you just aim randomly on the map, guaranteed!
damit! I wish i had tried elise!

Lulu was not the same after the 10% to 5% nerf

the only thing lulu had was outrunning people but now champions like fizz, riven, kassadin, even yi have few if any issues keeping up 
and those champions all win in terms of damage/burst 

10% to 5% of 800 AP is a whole lot
None, because I couldn't play anyone else thanks to such champions, great mode, 10/10.

Full AP {{champion:22}}. MARK NUTT!!!

But seriously, landing those long range hurtful arrows is always pleasant. Sometimes I managed to kill people without even aiming properly! Just point at the minimap, shoot the ult and pray. Killed a Shaco twice because of that. XD
